install.name: Content - CBAuthorPlug
install.author: Tony Korologos TKServer.com
install.description: Plugin which displays Community Builder link and/or avatar of author in Joomla content. Visit TKServer.com for support, more info and other useful Joomla systems. Text color adjustments are standard CSS codes: e.g. #000000 equals black, #DDDDDD equals gray. CSS text codes for colors will also work: Black, Red, Silver, Maroon, Green etc.

param.name: showname
param.label: Show name or username
param.description: Select wether to show name or username

param.name: disablejauthor
param.label: Replace J!Author with CB Author
param.description: Select wether to replace joomla author with CB author, and respect Joomla author show/hide article settings

param.name: showfrontpage
param.label: Show on front page articles
param.description: Select wether or not to show plugin on front page articles

param.name: exclude_authors
param.label: Exclude authors
param.description: Enter user IDs separated by commas. Example: 62,75,103

param.name: exclude_secs
param.label: Exclude sections
param.description: Enter section IDs separated by commas. Example: 62,75,103

param.name: exclude_cats
param.label: Exclude categories
param.description: Enter category IDs separated by commas. Example: 62,75,103

param.name: textfloat
param.label: Text float left or right
param.description: Text float none or left or right
